name: Barry Adamson
description: '''Barry Adamson''' (born 11 June 1958) is an English pop and rock musician. He came to prominence in the late 1970s as a member of the [[post-punk]] band [[Magazine (band)|Magazine]] and went on to work with [[Visage (band)|Visage]], [[Nick Cave and the Bad Seeds]], and the electro musicians [[Pan Sonic]]. In addition to prolific solo work, Adamson has also remixed [[Grinderman]], [[The Jon Spencer Blues Explosion]], [[Recoil (band)|Recoil]] and [[Depeche Mode]]. He also worked on the soundtrack for [[David Lynch]]'s surrealistic crime film ''[[Lost Highway (soundtrack)|Lost Highway]]''.
